title: IModelViewManager.DisplayWindowFromHandlex64
description: Displays a .NET control in this model view on 64-bit machines.
signature:
System.Boolean DisplayWindowFromHandlex64( 
   System.String
Name
,
   System.Int64
WindowHandle
,
   System.Boolean
SplitWindow
)

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: User-defined label that appears on the tab

parameters.name: SplitWindow
parameters.description: True to add a splitter window, false to not

returns: True if .NET control is created, false if not
remarks: This method is only available through early binding and with 64-bit versions of the SOLIDWORKS software.
